attributes.action: Take Positive anti-identity theft action as a result of the Child Benefit data loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The actions taken so far to prevent identity theft as a direct result of HMRC's loss of the Child Benefit Data Discs are inadequate. The Government should instigate and pay for credit file monitoring services such as those provided by Equifax etc for all those whose personal details have been mislaid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
